item.description:
Start here to obtain an access token (carried in the api_token environment variable)
using a username and password. You can also refresh the token for longer sessions.

item.description:
Create new access rules within the genreal NGFW access policy to allow VPN
access and deny blacklisted networks.

item.description:
Delete the default access rule which permits all traffic and add in a replacement
rule to permit general in-to-out traffic. Finally, deploy the new configuration
changes. Confirm the changes were applied by checking the deployment status.
